page.title: 12ACTIVITIES,CLUBS,PAST-TIMES.
page.content: There are very few activities in our village but we still manage to find lots of things to do.The boys go to cubs and scouts whilst the girls go to brownies and guides. There are mixed clubs as well and many of the village children go to swimming & tennis clubs. From a survey we did among our class we found guides to be most popular for girls & cricket for the boys. Our parents play skittles, run guide companies, go ballroom dancing and are members of the Indian Club. All these are activites which take place outside the village. In the village there is a village hall where a Whist Club meets as does the local W.I. and a playgroup.The local pub has a darts & quiz team.Villagers find plenty to do but mainly outside the village.
